ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.points

Class ElevationMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.points.ElevationMap

  • public class ElevationMap
extends java.lang.Object
    ElevationMap is a class that represents the elevation map of the bounding box sorrounding the user. The Elevation map is retrieved using the OpenTopography API as an AAIGrid and then converted into an array of integers representing the height. Using the SRTMGL3 data a precision of 3 arc second (~90 meter) is obtained. A method to obtain an updated elevation map is provided. A method to obtain the altitude at a certain location (using coordinates or indexes is provided). A method to compute the indexes of coordinates for accessing the topography map is provided. A method to obtain the map cell size in arcs/s is provided.

    • Method Detail

      • getTopographyMap

        public int[][] getTopographyMap()
        Public method to retrieve the elevation map.
        Returns:
        an int[][] array representing the elevation map.

      • updateElevationMatrix

        public void updateElevationMatrix()
        This method handles the updating of the elevation map. First the distance between the center of the current bounding box and the current user location is computed. If less than MINIMUM_DISTANCE_FOR_UPDATE no new map is downloaded, otherwise a new map is downloaded.
